thread.section_title: US News, Breaking News and Headlines - Wall Street Journal
thread.title: Maker of Bump Stocks to Stop Taking Orders, Shut Website

author: Zusha Elinson
title: Maker of Bump Stocks to Stop Taking Orders, Shut Website
text:
Bump-stock maker Slide Fire will stop taking orders for the device that makes semiautomatic rifles shoot like rapid-fire machine guns and shut down its website on May 20, the company announced Tuesday.
The announcement comes as the federal government moves ahead with plans for a bump-stock ban, which could take effect later this year.
